tool_description:
A simple Starcraft II replay parser in the cloud. Upload a replay to retrieve the map name, player info, win/loss results, and more. 

Easily integrate SC2 replay data into your projects.
name: Tassadar
title: Tassadar

api_list.name: uploadReplay
api_list.description: Analyze the contents of an SC2Replay file. Analyzed replays are discarded immediately.
